88742.「……おお！ 待っていたよ。\n 私は ティービス。\n <%sEV_SYOK_:
Oh! I've been waiting for you. I'm Teebis, the
one who asked the guild for the
<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>.

88743.「では まず 依頼した\n <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>を 受け取ろうか。:
So, first, let's receive the requested
<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>.

88745.「うむ。噂どおり すばらしい品だ。\n ……きっと ギルドマスターの指導が\n:
Hmmm. It is as wonderful as they say. I'm sure
the guildmaster's guidance is good.

88746.「ところで 君が所属する\n さいほうギルドのマスターだが……\n いったい ど:
By the way, what kind of person is the master
of the Sewing Guild to which you belong?

88747.「若きウェディとは 聞いているが\n 名前は？ 目の色や 髪の色は？\n 背びれ:
We've heard of young Weddie, but what's his name? What color are her eyes? What color is her hair? What is the shape of her dorsal fin?
Please tell me!

88748.<pc>は ティービスに\nマスター・ユービアのことを 説明した。:
<pc> explained to Teebis about
Guildmaster Yubia.

88749.「……やはり 間違いない！\n あの子は…ユービアは\n 生きていてくれたんだっ:
After all, there is no doubt! That girl Yubia
was alive!

88750.「いや おどろかせてすまない。\n じつは私は ユービアの父親なのだ。:
No, I'm sorry to frighten you. I am actually
Yubia's father.

88751.「かつて 幼い息子を連れて 旅をしていた途中\n 魔物に襲われて 大ケガを負い:
Once, while traveling with my young son, I was attacked by a monster and badly injured, and the next thing I knew, I was being carried
into the town church.

88752.「みな 息子はとっくに死んだと言ったが\n 私は生きていると信じ 探し続けた。\:
Everyone told me my son was long dead, but I
believed he was alive, and I kept looking. For
over a decade.

88753.「そして さいほうギルドのマスターが\n 息子に似た人物と知り 真実を確かめるた:
When he found out that the master of the
Sewing Guild looked like his son, he asked the
guild to do a job for him to verify the truth.

88754.「本当に ユービアは生きているのだと\n 君のおかげで ようやく確信が持てたよ。:
Thanks to you, I am finally convinced that
Yubia is really alive. Thank you. Thank you
from the bottom of my heart.

88755.「ユービア……。\n あの子に会うのは ずいぶん ひさしぶりだ。\n 私のことを:
Yubia. It's been a long time since I've seen
her. I hope she remembers me.

88756.「……やはり 面影があるな。\n ずいぶん探したぞ ユービア。:
...Indeed, there is a resemblance. I've been
looking for you for a long time, Yubia.

88757.「あの……アナタは？\n どこで お会いしたのか\n まったく わからないのです:
Um... Who are you? I have no idea where we
met.

88758.「なんだと？\n ユービア。この私のことを\n 覚えていないというのかっ！？: What? Yubia, you don't remember me?

88759.「……いや すまん。責める資格などないな。\n あの時 幼いお前を 守りきれなか:
No, I'm sorry. I have no right to blame you.
It's my fault for not being able to protect
you as a child back then.

88760.「我が子ユービアよ。\n どうか この父を 許してくれ。:
My child Yubia. Please, forgive this father of
yours.

88762.「そうとも！\n 大きくなったな ユービア……。: Yes, that's right! You've grown up, Yubia.

88764.「……ボクの父さんは 亡霊になったはず。\n アナタなんて ボクは知らない！:
My father was supposed to become a ghost. I
don't know anything about you!

88765.「亡霊？ なんのことだ ユービア。\n 私は こうして\n ちゃんと 生きている:
Ghost? What are you talking about, Yubia? I'm
alive and well.

88766.「もう アナタの話は 聞きたくない！\n お願いです。帰ってください！！:
I don't want to hear your words anymore!
Please, I beg you. Leave!!

88767.「……そうか 急に すまなかったな。\n 今は受け入れられなくても しかたがない:
Okay. I'm sorry for the suddenness of it all.
It's okay if you can't accept it now. I'll
come back again soon.

115037.「なんだ……まるで 亡霊にでも\n 会ったような顔をして……？: Why do you look as if you've just met a ghost?
